desc: Timeless, quality, and beautifully designed products for you and your pet . Ethically sourced with a sustainable and philanthropic mindset. Buy 1, we give $1 to find homeless animals their loving home.

layout.text: Bespoke Paws was created to offer high quality, sophisticated products in the pet industry.
Our products are meant to elevate the offerings for pets, with timeless sense of style, and uncompromising excellence.
We take quality and craftsmanship very seriously, to ensure we offer premium fashion for pets, and their humans.
